sentences.sentence: D CT can vividly demonstrate the shape and spatial relationships of malleus and incus.
sentences.translation: 三维ct能生动地显示锤骨、砧骨的立体形态及空间关系。

sentences.sentence: Also note the position of the handle of the malleus and inspect the short process of the malleus.
sentences.translation: 同时也要注意处理锤骨时的位置以及检查锤骨的最短过程。
